Bases: Model

Model representing an album in the database.

Parameters:

models.Model (class) – The base class for all Django database models.

Variables:

  • release_date (DateField) – The release date of the album.

band.views.landing_page(request)[source]

Render the landing page.

If the request method is POST, attempt to authenticate the user. If authentication is successful, log in the user and redirect to the landing page.

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request.

Returns:

Rendered HTML response for the landing page.

Return type:

HttpResponse

Log out the user.

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request.

Returns:

Return type:

HttpResponse

band.views.register(request)[source]

Handle user registration.

If the request method is POST, validate the registration form. If the form is valid, create a new user, log in, and redirect to the landing page.

Parameters:

request (HttpRequest) – The HTTP request.

Returns:

Rendered HTML response for the registration page.

Return type:

HttpResponse
